oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hood, Ralph W.; Williamson, W. Paul (William Paul)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Video recording of a service opening with Pastor Virgil Porter inviting members of the church to the altar for prayer. Members pray at the altar and in their pews. Music follows the prayer and as a Steve Porter sings, Louis Hobbs plays guitar, Virgil Porter plays drums, and Carl Porter plays cymbals. Singers change and Virgil Porter plays drums and sings. He is followed by Louis Hobbs. Carl porter handles a large serpent as they sing. The music pauses and, Carl Porter testifies before the music begins again. As before, Steve Porter sings, but he is joined by Tammy Porter. Following their song, Virgil Porter preaches and asks for members to pray for him. Louis Hobbs, Carl Porter and others pray for him. Louis Hobbs speaks afterward and his speech ends the video.
